content: What famous Italian explorer, who completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean, is credited with opening the way for widespread European exploration and colonization of the Americas?

I believe you're referring to Christopher Columbus. He was an Italian explorer who completed four voyages across the Atlantic Ocean under the auspices of the Catholic Monarchs of Spain. His voyages, between 1492 and 1504, initiated the widespread contact between Europe and the Americas, which marked the beginning of the European exploration and conquest of the Americas.
